Name: Lugh
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with The Light Blade and The Staff of the Skies.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend Characteristic of 0.
Every time this model fails to hit or wound you may re-roll any result of 1 or 2.

Spells.Name: Light of Lugh (30)
Spells.Effect: Select an enemy Formation within 12" of this model and place a Barrage Template centred anywhere over the selected enemy Formation. Roll a D6 for each model under that template. On each roll of 4+, the Formation that model belongs to suffers 1 Ethereal Damage. In addition, until the end of the turn if a Formation that suffered any ethereal damage as a result of this Magic Spell fails a Will Power Test, then D6 additional models automatically flee from that Formation.
